title: Continous "server is busy" message, high ping, spikes and disconnections.
body: Almost all the time I'm getting in the logging screen a "server is busy" message, and when I do manage to log in, the ping is atrocious, ranging from 230 to 900 ping, but at any rate, it's super duper spikey. Thing is, my ping is at all times 80-90, at max. 130, even when I'm downloading stuff the game doesn't turn this unresponsive. I can't do such a simple task as ulting in a middle of a fight with trynd, as doesnt activate, not mattering how many times I click it, and when i e'd towards dragon, it responded 2 secs later, diving me back to the fight i was escaping from. All game this horrible lag was on and I couldn't even freakin move barely on lane, so I decided to afk instead of feeding hard, which ended happening due to the crappy ults I threw. Hope someone can help me fix this, pls.

replies.body:
Given the Login error as well as the ability delays in-game, this all seems to point to a type of connection issue between your computer and the League of Legends servers.  I can't quite say what the specific root cause is, but make sure to complete all of the steps in our [Connection Issues Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664).  The solutions there are the most common fixes that should get your connection stable and Tryndamere Ult's going off properly.

Reply back and let me know if nothing seems to help!
